name: 1999 Pokemon Game 1st Edition 4 Charizard Holo PSA 7 NM (0x5ce5...2c36)
description: RareMint Pokemon Genesis Mystery Pack (0x5ce59c7ec851e41ecb5904e2bfa4d1d1052dbfb5353a75163fa3902c4a302c36) derived from the human readeable fingerprint of the physical item - which will be revealed at the same time as the NFT itself - using the Keccak256 cryptographic function. This unique identifier serves as a verifiable *Proof of Integrity* to certify that the corresponding physical asset is irrevocably associated to this NFT and vice-versa.
